name: Mike Epps
summary: Mike Epps. Actor: Resident Evil: Apocalypse. Mike Epps was born on 18 November 1970 in Indianapolis, Indiana, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for Resident Evil: Apocalypse (2004), The Hangover (2009) and Friday After Next (2002). He has been married to Kyra Robinson since 23 June 2019. They have one child. He was previously married to Mechelle McCain.
